alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Washington (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 08 at 2:40PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of central and east central Missouri, including the following areas, in central Missouri, Osage MO. In east central Missouri, Crawford MO and Washington MO. * WHEN...Through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Slow moving and repeat thunderstorms are expected, resulting in rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches in a short time, and isolated rainfall totals of up to 5 inches.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
